Articles.Content:
Hello all you Kerbal space engineers and program executives! With the recent version .90 being out I was able to tweak aircraft in a way that let me create some really fun ultra-light type aircraft in KSP (stock parts). I wanted to share my experiences of those aircraft with other people who may be interested in them so I thought about it for a few days and decided the best place for that would be here in the KSP forums.

Not only that, but this is my introductory post in the KSP forums so a big hello to everyone out there in the forums!! Here's the link to the playlist of all my stock ultra-lights in KSP:

To kick things off here in the forum, here's the first video in the playlist:

hf, gg, peace out!

Edited January 13, 2015 by mss2011
